name: i hate answering the phone
description:
a game about being super jazzed to talk to your best friend and super not jazzed about having to do the awkward bit at the start of the conversation before you settle into the groove of it all

made for the Emotions & Feelings jam's Friendship edition

slowly and then rapidly pieced together in Bitsy by Ric Cowley across two very late nights when he definitely should have been asleep
